name: With Your Mom's Tits
storyline: Cousins Mana and Joe become orphaned after disaster strikes their hometown of Marglencia. Bereft with grief, the two children find solace in each other's company and embark on a soul-searching trip to the top of Mount Apefa. Their path is dangerous and unpredictable, but on their side is a helpful companion: Joe's mother's secret pet dog Tits who possesses magical powers.
summary: With Your Mom's Tits is an Adventure RPG set in a vast fantasy world filled with various countries, towns, humans, animals, and monsters. Fight your way through a treacherous continent to rediscover the meaning of life — with the help of a cute magical dog!
